gameDetails.name: Madeira: The Harvester
gameDetails.description:
Mini-Expansion for Madeira.

Included in the Spielbox Magazine 7/2013

1 Character Card (Erntehelfer - The Harvester)

After the distribution of the four regular characters in phase A, the Erntehelfer comes into the remaining empty building.
In phase B, a player can alternatively place a guild or pirate dice on the Erntehelfer to perform a particular crop in the region of the Erntehelfer.
